item.title: Hacking Whonix onto Hyper-V
item.description: Hi, disclaimer, this is not officially supported by Whonix so expect no support. Hi again, Whonix does not have UEFI support at the moment, so you will have to resort to this guide hacking UEFI together if you want to run Generation 2 virtual machines. Download Whonix and Virtualbox qemu-imgis broken when trying to convert to vhdx Verify the authenticity of the downloaded files. Extract the image with your archive utility of choice
